name: Vault of the Minifiends
description:
Your name is Miss Protagonist. (It's a Jam-game so, eh)             

Basically, you heard from the townspeople that there’s a secret Treasure inside the abandoned Cave near the Woods.

You’re greedy so you want to find it, but there’s a tiny catch,

The Cave is full of small monsters!

Equipped with just a whip, you venture into it ...
